body:
Okay, so the main problem was that server administrators gave access to file server to wrong identity that was running different server. It took me some time to figure that out.

But that at first also didn't solve the problem.

I found simple way to run that part of code that makes request to file server as app pool identity.

SPSecurity.RunWithElevatedPrivileges(delegate()
                {
              //Code here
                });
title: Error access when I'm trying to make request not from dev environment
